name: The LBGT Asylum Project
description: San Francisco's only exclusively dedicated legal services firm to providing accessible representation for the LGBT asylum seekers who are fleeing persecution due to their sexual orientation, gender identity, and/or HIV status. Services will not be denied because of financial concerns.
fullDescription: San Francisco's only exclusively dedicated legal services firm to providing accessible representation for the LGBT asylum seekers who are fleeing persecution due to their sexual orientation, gender identity, and/or HIV status. Services will not be denied because of financial concerns.
